footer.importantNote: Important Note: This website is designed for clients seeking legal representation in Personal Injury (PI) and Criminal Defense (CD) cases. The website allows you to submit an inquiry form to contact our firm. Please be aware that JS Law Group, LLC never charges clients any fees upfront or before providing legal services. We do not request payment, banking details, or personal financial information prior to consultation or case evaluation. All initial consultations are free, and fees are only discussed after we have reviewed your case and agreed to represent you.

section1.title: Legal Expertise That Delivers Results
section1.paragraph: After a car crash, you need more than just legal advice—you need a team that puts you first. JS Law Group offers personalized attention and transparent communication, guiding you through every step of the legal process. You focus on healing; we focus on securing the compensation you deserve.

section2.title: Dedicated Attorneys. Client-Centered Support
section2.paragraph: JS Law Group represents people affected by motor vehicle accidents and other personal injury matters. Whether you need help reaching a fair settlement or preparing for trial, our team handles a wide range of cases with legal expertise and a commitment to your best outcome. From severe injuries to straightforward claims, we fight for your rights.

section3.title: Why Your Case Needs a Tailored Approach
section3.paragraph: No two accidents are the same. Details matter—who was at fault, the road conditions, and the severity of injuries. The attorneys at JS Law Group analyze every angle to build a strong case. We don't rely on a one-size-fits-all approach; we build a strategy specifically for you to secure the best possible outcome.

section4.title: Where Our Experience Can Make a Difference
section4.subtitle: From devastating crashes to minor fender benders, JS Law Group handles motor vehicle and personal injury cases with dedicated expertise.

trucking.title: Trucking and 18-Wheeler Accidents
trucking.desc: These cases require specialized litigation. Our team is prepared to hold trucking companies accountable and fight for the compensation you deserve.

pedestrian.title: Pedestrian and Bicycle Accidents
pedestrian.desc: If you were hit while biking or walking, your case deserves special attention. JS Law Group ensures your rights are protected.

motorcycle.title: Motorcycle Accidents
motorcycle.desc: Motorcyclists often face severe injuries. We help maximize compensation for medical bills and other losses.

rideshare.title: Rideshare and Commercial Vehicle Accidents
rideshare.desc: Accidents involving Uber, Lyft, or company vehicles often involve complex insurance. We handle the details so you can focus on recovery.

intersection.title: Intersection / T-Bone / Rear-End Accidents
intersection.desc: Even "simple" accidents can cause long-term pain. Our attorneys handle the details and fight for your recovery.

delayed.title: Low Impact or Delayed Injury Accidents
delayed.desc: Some injuries appear weeks later. Don't sign anything or settle until you've spoken with our team.

section6.title: Real Compensation for Real Losses
section6.paragraph: Medical bills, lost wages, and emotional distress are real costs. If you are entitled to compensation, JS Law Group will fight to see that you receive it. Our team is committed to transparent communication and securing the best outcome for every client.

section7.title: Frequently Asked Questions
section7.q1: Do I need a lawyer if I wasn't at fault?
section7.a1: Yes, insurance companies often try to minimize payouts regardless of fault. A lawyer ensures you get fair treatment.
section7.q2: What if I was a pedestrian or a passenger?
section7.a2: You still have rights. Passengers and pedestrians are often entitled to significant compensation.
section7.q3: Is it expensive to hire a lawyer?
section7.a3: JS Law Group works on a contingency basis for many personal injury matters—you only pay if we recover for you. We do not charge upfront fees before providing legal services.
section7.q4: Is there a deadline to file?
section7.a4: Yes, statutes of limitation vary by state. It is crucial to act quickly.
section7.a5: Use the form at the top of this page to tell us about your case, or call us for a free consultation. Our team will review your situation and recommend the next steps.

motorVehicleAccident.pageTitle: JS Law Group - Motor Vehicle Accident

step1.title: Call the Police
step1.desc: It's important to ensure your safety and document the incident.

step2.title: Take Photographs and Recordings
step2.desc: Secure all the information you can, including of witnesses, the scene, and the accident.

step3.title: Pay Attention
step3.desc: Listen and record details from the other party, especially any admittance or what they believe caused the accident. These answers can be used in court.

step4.title: Seek Medical Attention
step4.desc: Cooperate with emergency medical personnel or seek your doctor/physician as soon as possible. Documentation of your injuries also helps build your case.

step5.title: Seek Legal Advice
step5.desc: Call and trust your attorneys. Cooperate with law enforcement as required, but consider consulting your attorney before providing detailed or recorded statements, especially to insurance representatives or other non-emergency parties.

step6.title: Be Patient
step6.desc: Your health is what's most important. Let JS Law Group handle your case. We'll worry about the legalities while you focus on your recovery plan.

step1.title: You'll talk to a real person.
step1.desc: JS Law Group is always available 24/7. When you call, you'll be connected with our team, who will be ready to offer you assistance.

step2.title: We'll recommend your next steps.
step2.desc: With your information, our team will determine your likely chance for compensation. If we think you have a strong case, you can decide if you'd like us to fight for you.

step3.title: We'll work to win your case.
step3.desc: Once you sign with JS Law Group, we'll handle the rest. Your attorney will fight the opposing party to get the compensation owed to you by law.

vehicleAccidents.title: Trust (770) 222-4444 After Your Motor Vehicle Accident
vehicleAccidents.subtitle: Our attorneys at JS Law Group specialize in motor vehicle accident cases. Our goal is always to get you the maximum compensation you deserve.

car.title: Car Accidents
car.desc: If you have been involved in a car accident and were injured as a result, you could be entitled to compensation for medical treatment, vehicle repair, and other related expenses. JS Law Group will defend your claim and fight for the results you deserve.

motorcycle.title: Motorcycle Accidents
motorcycle.desc: Motorcycle accidents have high fatality rates, and injuries are almost guaranteed. Nearby cars have a duty to drive responsibly when motorcyclists are present. JS Law Group provides experienced and compassionate representation for motorcycle accident victims.

rideshare.title: Rideshare
rideshare.desc: Navigating claims for Uber or Lyft accidents requires specialized knowledge of commercial policies. JS Law Group will handle the complexities while you focus on recovery.

truck.title: Commercial Truck Accidents
truck.desc: Commercial vehicle accidents often involve federal safety violations and multiple liable parties. Our attorneys at JS Law Group will fight parties of companies and corporations to secure maximum payouts.

personalInjury.content:
Personal Injury

Navigating the aftermath of an injury is overwhelming, but you are not alone. We are dedicated to fighting for your rights and securing the compensation you deserve so you can focus on healing and rebuilding your life.

  • Motor Vehicle Accidents
  • Slip & Fall
  • Wrongful Death
  • Defective Products
personalInjury.article:
Understanding Personal Injury Claim

When you are injured due to someone else's negligence, the legal and financial aftermath can be just as painful as the injury itself. Understanding your rights and getting legal help is the first step toward recovery.

Personal injury can be a devastating experience. It's never an expected event, and we're here to help you through this tough time. If you are facing personal injury, damages, or wrongful death from the negligence of others, our team of experienced lawyers is here to protect your rights and get you the compensation you deserve. Our team truly understands the pain that you're going through, and we want to get you what you need to start recovering.

As attorneys that focus on a client-centered experience, we only want the best outcome. Through legal expertise, transparent communication, and effective solutions, we will secure your rights and the recompense that you're looking for.

What Constitutes a Claim?

If you need to seek compensation for emotional, physical, or psychological harm done by another party, then our team of attorneys is here for you. If the other party committed harm due to negligence, recklessness, or intentional acts, then you might have a claim. When it was their actions - or their lack of actions - that was the direct cause of your pain, then they are potentially liable for the damage that you took. If your situation fits these criteria, then schedule a free consultation with us now to see what we can do for you.

Our Process: Investigation to Resolution

Though every case is personal and different, you can have broad expectations of various consultations, followed by dedicated investigation and collection of evidence. Once all records are obtained, then our attorneys will likely move to filing a claim and demand for compensation. If a settlement isn't reached by this point, then we may move to trial, where we will fight fiercely for your rights and the compensation you deserve.

criminalDefense.content:
Criminal Defense

Facing criminal charges can be one of the most stressful experiences of your life, but you don't have to face it alone. We provide a robust, strategic defense to protect your freedom, your rights, and your future.

  • DUI / DWI
  • Drug Offenses
  • Violent Crimes
  • White Collar Crimes
criminalDefense.article:
Navigating Your Criminal Defense

A criminal charge can feel like the end of the world, but it doesn't have to define you or your future. A strategic, aggressive defense is critical during this time. Let us be the ones to help you.

Being charged, regardless of if it is a felony charge or a misdemeanor, can be one of the most difficult times in your life. Our team understands this and is here to help. As experienced attorneys capable of navigating trial with legal expertise and skillful solutions, we will work with you to get you the best results possible. Defending not just your rights, but also your innocence is our greatest priority.

Your Rights Are Paramount

Your constitutional rights are always in effect, and this includes when you get arrested and are held for questioning. Understanding them is your first line of defense.

  • Fourth Amendment Protection Against Unreasonable Searches and Seizures
  • Fifth Amendment Right to Remain Silent
  • Sixth Amendment Right to Legal Counsel and to Be Informed of the Charges

Common Defense Strategies

Every case is different, but our skilled attorneys are ready for anything. Even before the charges go to trial, we will be active and may try to challenge the evidence, negotiate a plea deal, or even attempt to dismiss the case. We will explore every avenue in order to protect your rights. Our team could argue your innocence, citing an alibi or a mistaken identity. We could note that your actions were committed under a legally excusable circumstance, like duress or self-defense. Our team could raise reasonable doubt against the prosecution's case, leading to a favorable outcome. Regardless of the specific method, know that our team is ready to assist and defend your case with legal expertise, effective solutions, and skillful trial maneuvering. Let us offer you a free consultation with us today.
